name: Antioch Dunes National Wildlife Refuge
description: Antioch Dunes National Wildlife Refuge is the only national wildlife refuge in the country established to protect endangered plants and insects – the Antioch Dunes evening primrose, the Contra Costa wallflower, and the Lange's metalmark butterfly.
